comment: Took him for beginning martial Arts. Best one credit class ever. He works with you and  he is a understandable teacher. It was fun I would recommend him and you learn a lot to protect yourself. You have a midterm and final (online). Make sure go to class attendance is a must.
Easy class but did not learn anything.
The teachers at Kennesaw should take a class with this professor regarding how to utilize Vista.

New teacher so he still seems a litle confused at times.However, I made and A in his class.He tends to make alot of mistakes as well so please check and make sure he grades things correctly cause that can be a big issue. I think he has made about 3 mistakes with me that include my tests and my final grade.But overall really nice guy and easy class!
